General.Name: Beijing New Space Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing New Space Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the provision of professional contracting services for urban and road lighting engineering. The company offers smart streetlamps, which provides a complete system platform and solutions, including intelligent lighting, communication services, video and environmental monitoring, energy services, security monitoring, information interaction, and municipal services. It is also involved in systematically building core theme brands based on the night economies, developing corresponding night tour products, and making coordinated arrangements for thematic activities and supporting services. In addition, the company offers planning consultation, night tour planning, thematic creative, business layout, and product creativity solutions. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
